description:
GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols. It is a non-interactive command-line tool, so it may easily be called from scripts, cron jobs, terminals without X-Windows support, etc. GNU Wget has many features to make retrieving large files or mirroring entire web or FTP sites easy.
      This package installs GNU Wget in C:\Program Files\Tools directory, both on x86 and x64 systems.
summary: Wget - retrieve files from the WWW.
author: Hrvoje Niksic,  Giuseppe Scrivano
